727452f-a.text:
Myrtle Avenue, south side, between 117th Street and Jamaica Avenue, showing the Triangle Hofbrau Restaurant, occupying an old frame house, formely J. Gunthers hotel (1891). Myrtle Avenue was formely the Williamsburg and Jamaica Turnpike. The Jamaica
Avenue "El" is in the background.
P. L. Sperr  April 23, 1936
